backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two user-interaction changes and the frontend files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Existing summaries of key frontend files generated by a prior process.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell that loads the React application into a root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders the RVExperience component as the main app view.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Empty component placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/rv/AnimatedTrave: Crossfading image animation component providing a motion fallback when video playback fails.
frontend/src/components/rv/BreakStopReac: Overlay screen shown when reaching a break stop, playing sound and offering a continue button.
frontend/src/components/rv/CampfireEndSc: Campfire arrival overlay with celebration visuals and a continue action.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Empty component placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines checkpoint and action data structures and exports three preset checkpoints with their actions.
frontend/src/components/rv/ClickToContin: Full‑screen clickable overlay prompting the user to continue.
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Failure-state overlay with animated indicators and a multiple‑choice quiz gating progression.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Displays journey status, break stop count, and progress bar based on the current flow state.
frontend/src/components/rv/RVBadgeCelebr: Shows a celebratory badge UI with animations and a button to proceed after earning the RV badge.
Controls the overall RV journey flow, rendering scenes based on flow state and managing audio, transitions, and user actions.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Defines scene metadata and exports several preset travel scenes plus special halt and destination scenes.
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Start screen presenting journey overview and a button to begin the RV adventure.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Displays a static travel scene with a background image, title, and description overlay.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Shows an animated loading-style transition screen between travel segments or before destination arrival.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Plays a travel video with fallback logic, monitoring stalls and triggering callbacks for timing or user advancement.
Final screen summarizing the trip and offering an option to restart the journey.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Implements state machine hooks for the RV journey flow, including traveling, break stops, issues, and completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: Custom hook for playing and stopping sound effects using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining a warm road‑trip color palette and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, and feature requirements for RV Journey development.
